entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , McCreary
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:21 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this morning. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 19. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Windy. High minus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023
